name: Max Crowdfund
description: The Max Crowdfund Token (MCF) was created by Max Property Group. Max Crowdfund is an international real estate crowdfunding platform on blockchain technology. The MCF Token pays out 5% of all transactions to liquidity pool providers and 1% of all transactions to all token holders. There is a buy-back and burn program where 0.1% of all investments made on all Max Crowdfund platforms will be used to buy back and burn MCF tokens.
